meanings.sent1: The mustinesses in the old books made them unpleasant to read.
meanings.sent2: I could smell the mustinesses in the basement as soon as I opened the door.
meanings.sent3: The mustinesses in the attic were so strong, it felt like the house was holding its breath.
meanings.sent4: The mustinesses of the abandoned house clung to my clothes like a ghostly presence.
meanings.sent5: The mustinesses of the antique shop transported me back in time to a bygone era.

meanings.sent1: We had to clean out the basement to get rid of the mustinesses that had accumulated over the years.
meanings.sent2: The mustinesses of the old furniture reminded me of my grandmother's house.
meanings.sent3: The mustinesses of the forgotten room seemed to whisper secrets of the past.
meanings.sent4: The mustinesses of the cellar enveloped me like a shroud of memories.
meanings.sent5: The mustinesses of the cabin gave it a cozy, nostalgic feel.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a stale, moldy odor.
meanings.sent1: The mustinesses of the damp basement were overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: I wrinkled my nose at the mustinesses emanating from the old rug.
meanings.sent3: The mustinesses of the attic made me sneeze uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The mustinesses of the cellar clung to the air like a persistent fog.
meanings.sent5: The mustinesses of the abandoned house filled the room with a sense of decay.
